alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Maury (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lewis, northwestern Maury and southeastern Hickman Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Centerville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Santa Fe, Williamsport and Hampshire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
